itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Black Stone Crystal that can be fused into Shoe sockets.
- Item Effect: Fall Damage -15%
※ This magic crystal has a high chance of shattering if your Character dies.

- Equipment can be transfused through Black Spirits.

item.name: Magic Crystal of Nature - Falling
item.desc:
A Black Stone Crystal that can be fused into Shoe sockets.
- Item Effect: Fall Damage -10%
※ This magic crystal has a high chance of shattering if your Character dies.

- Equipment can be transfused through Black Spirits.

item.name: Fruit of Enchantment
item.desc: An ingredient used in Alchemy that can be obtained through farming. It can be used directly or refined into an essence for use.\n- How to Obtain: This alchemical ingredient can be obtained through Farming in a Garden, but only rarely.

item.name: Magic Crystal of Crimson Flame - Precision
item.desc:
A Black Stone Crystal that can be fused into Weapon sockets. 
- Item Effect: All Accuracy +1
※ This magic crystal has a high chance of shattering if your Character dies.

- Equipment can be transfused through Black Spirits.

item.name: Ruby
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding a Rough Ruby.

item.name: Wild Grass
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained from Wild Herbs using Barehanded Gathering.

※ This magic crystal has a high chance of shattering if your Character dies.

item.name: Sapphire
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding Rough Sapphire.

item.name: Weeds
item.desc: It’s just a useless weed. You can sell it for a cheap price to merchants.

※ This magic crystal has a high chance of shattering if your Character dies.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.
